metadata.ns:textReviewContext: Remote user interacts with a cloud application
metadata.ns:textName: AE06 Disclosure Of Credentials Of Cloud Management Interface
metadata.ns:textReviewSolution: Apply credentials rotation policy; Apply muti-factor authentication; Apply certificate-based authentication;
metadata.ns:textReviewProblem: Disclosure of user credentials of management interface of cloud application
metadata.ns:textReference: MS-1: Vulnerabilities in the measurement infrastructure that is used for billing [SECCRIT]; MS-2: Attacks to the metering infrastructure that holds confidential account information... [SECCRIT]; Management Interface Compromise [QUIRC]
